price: Kwani hamwoni jinsi Mwenyezi Mungu alivyo ziumba mbingu saba kwa matabaka?
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَوۡاْ كَيۡفَ خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ سَبۡعَ سَمَٰوَٰتٖ طِبَاقٗا
footnotes: Kwani huoni vipi Mwenyezi Mungu alivyo ziumba mbingu saba, moja juu ya moja,

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: alam taraw kayfa khalaqa al-lahu sabʿa samāwātin ṭibāqan
